Combat
Hit Points: 91 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 4
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Half Plate Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe (+8 1d12+2); Light Hammer (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Rapier (+8 1d8+2); Shortbow (+7 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+8 1d6+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +3 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Superior Technique): Has the Combat Superiority feature with 1 maneuver and 1 superiority die
Fighting Style (Unarmed Fighting): Unarmed strike inflicts 1d6+2 HP bludgeoning
Great Stature: Has increased Giant's Might effects
Master Of Runes: Can invoke runes twice per short rest
Runic Juggernaut: Has increased Giant's Might effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Action Surge: Can take an extra action twice per short rest
Ambush: Can spend 1 superiority die to add the roll to initiative
Bait And Switch: Can spend 1 superiority die to swap places with an adjacent willing creature and to boost the Armor Class of either self or the other creature for 1 rd by the rolled value
Brace: Can spend 1 superiority die and use a reaction to attack a creature that moves into range, adding the roll to the damage
Bulwark Of Force: R30' Can use a bonus action to give 4 targets half cover for 1 min once per long rest; can spend Psionic Energy dice for additional uses
Cloud Rune: R30' Can use a reaction to redirect damage to a different target 2 times per short rest
Combat Superiority: Can use a d6 Superiority Die to perform one of 1 chosen Maneuvers 1 time per short rest
Fighting Style (Blind Fighting): R10' Can detect location of unseen creatures
Fighting Style (Interception): R5' Can use a reaction to negate 1d10+6 HP damage to another
Fighting Style (Thrown Weapon Fighting): Can draw thrown weapon as part of an attack, and throw weapons inflict +2 HP
Fighting Style (Unarmed Fighting): Unarmed strike inflicts 1d8+2 bludgeoning when unarmed and shieldless/Can inflict 1d4 HP bludgeoning to a grappled foe
Fire Rune: After a hit, can restrain and inflict +2d6 HP fire each rd (save DC 15 Strength ends) for 1 min 2 times per short rest
Giant's Might: Can use a bonus action to grow to Huge, with +5' reach and inflict +1d10 HP damage with a weapon or unarmed strike once per rd for 1 min 6 times per long rest
Grappling Strike: After a hit, can spend 1 superiority die to add the roll to an Athletics grapple check
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Protective Field: R30' Can spend 1 Psionic Energy die and use a reaction to negate 1d12+4 HP damage
Psionic Power: Can use 12d12 Psionic Energy dice per long rest and can use a bonus action to regain 1 die once per short rest
Psionic Strike: R30' Can spend 1 Psionic Energy die after a hit to inflict +1d12+4 HP force
Quick Toss: Can spend 1 superiority die and use a bonus action to draw and throw a weapon, adding the roll to the damage
Runic Shield: R60' Can use a reaction when another creature is hit to force a reroll 6 times per long rest
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Second Wind: Can use a bonus action to regain 1d10+20 hit points once per short rest
Stone Rune: R30' Can use a reaction to charm and halt a target (save DC 15 Wisdom ends) for 1 min 2 times per short rest
Storm Rune: Has immunity to surprise/Can use a bonus action and use a reaction to give advantage or disadvantage each rd on rolls on a target within 60' for 1 min 2 times per short rest
Telekinetic Movement: R30' Can move a Large object or creature 30' once per short rest; can spend Psionic Energy dice for additional uses
Telekinetic Thrust: Psionic Strike can inflict knocked prone or a 10' push (save DC 18 Strength negates)
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 7; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 1
Save Notes:
Frost Rune: Has advantage on Animal Handling and Intimidation
Giant's Might: Can use a bonus action to gain advantage on Strength saves for 1 min 6 times per long rest
Guarded Mind: Has resistance to psychic damage/Can spend 1 Psionic Energy die to end charmed and frightened conditions
Hill Rune: Has advantage vs. poison and resistance to poison damage/Can use a bonus action to gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing for 1 min 2 times per short rest
Indomitable: Can reroll a failed save 3 times per long rest
